segment.source: Use your current Mac computer to develop apps for Windows.
segment.target: Use your current Mac computer to develop apps for Windows.

segment.source: Setting up your Mac with Windows 10
segment.target: Setting up your Mac with Windows 10

segment.source: Setting up your Mac with Windows 10
segment.target: Setting up your Mac with Windows 10

segment.source: \[ Updated for UWP apps on Windows 10.
segment.target: \[ Updated for UWP apps on Windows 10.

segment.source: For Windows 8.x articles, see the archive \]
segment.target: For Windows 8.x articles, see the archive \]

segment.source: Use your current Mac computer to develop apps for Windows.
segment.target: Use your current Mac computer to develop apps for Windows.

segment.source: Run Windows on your Mac and use Visual Studio
segment.target: Run Windows on your Mac and use Visual Studio

segment.source: Are you ready to start developing Universal Windows apps, but you don't have a PC handy?
segment.target: Are you ready to start developing Universal Windows apps, but you don't have a PC handy?

segment.source: That's okay — you can use your Mac!
segment.target: That's okay — you can use your Mac!

segment.source: With popular third-party solutions like Apple Boot Camp, Oracle VirtualBox, VMware Fusion, and Parallels Desktop, you can install Windows 10 and Microsoft Visual Studio on your Apple computer.
segment.target: With popular third-party solutions like Apple Boot Camp, Oracle VirtualBox, VMware Fusion, and Parallels Desktop, you can install Windows 10 and Microsoft Visual Studio on your Apple computer.

segment.source: Note You will need a Windows 10 bootable image on disk or USB flash drive.
segment.target: Note You will need a Windows 10 bootable image on disk or USB flash drive.

segment.source: If you are a MSDN Subscriber, you can download the install image from the MSDN Subscriber Downloads center.
segment.target: If you are a MSDN Subscriber, you can download the install image from the MSDN Subscriber Downloads center.

segment.source: If you aren't a subscriber, the installer can be purchased from the Windows Store.
segment.target: If you aren't a subscriber, the installer can be purchased from the Windows Store.

segment.source: You can also download it from this location, which is useful if you are already running Windows and wish to upgrade.
segment.target: You can also download it from this location, which is useful if you are already running Windows and wish to upgrade.

segment.source: Once you have Windows running, you can then install Visual Studio 2015 from Developer downloads for Windows 10 and start writing apps!
segment.target: Once you have Windows running, you can then install Visual Studio 2015 from Developer downloads for Windows 10 and start writing apps!

segment.source: Note If you plan to use the Visual Studio device emulators, you must install a 64-bit (x64) version of Windows 10 Pro or better.
segment.target: Note If you plan to use the Visual Studio device emulators, you must install a 64-bit (x64) version of Windows 10 Pro or better.

segment.source: Unfortunately, some older Macs cannot run 64-bit Windows.
segment.target: Unfortunately, some older Macs cannot run 64-bit Windows.

segment.source: Please check with Apple if your hardware is compatible on thisApple support page.
segment.target: Please check with Apple if your hardware is compatible on thisApple support page.

segment.source: Apple Boot Camp
segment.target: Apple Boot Camp

segment.source: The Boot Camp Assistant app is pre-installed on every recent Mac, and launching it will walk you through the process of installing Windows 10.
segment.target: The Boot Camp Assistant app is pre-installed on every recent Mac, and launching it will walk you through the process of installing Windows 10.

segment.source: All you need is a copy of Windows (from the sources listed above) and at least 30 Gb of free disk space.
segment.target: All you need is a copy of Windows (from the sources listed above) and at least 30 Gb of free disk space.

segment.source: Once installed, you can choose to boot into Mac OSX or Windows 10.
segment.target: Once installed, you can choose to boot into Mac OSX or Windows 10.

segment.source: For more info, see Apple's Boot Camp instructions page.
segment.target: For more info, see Apple's Boot Camp instructions page.

segment.source: Parallels Desktop
segment.target: Parallels Desktop

segment.source: Using Parallels Desktop 11, you can run Windows apps side-by-side with existing Mac applications, including Visual Studio and Cortana.
segment.target: Using Parallels Desktop 11, you can run Windows apps side-by-side with existing Mac applications, including Visual Studio and Cortana.

segment.source: A pro version is available that includes extra features for developers, including improved debugging, and support for Docker and Jenkins.
segment.target: A pro version is available that includes extra features for developers, including improved debugging, and support for Docker and Jenkins.

segment.source: For more info, and a free trial version, see Parallels Desktop.
segment.target: For more info, and a free trial version, see Parallels Desktop.

segment.source: VMWare Fusion
segment.target: VMWare Fusion

segment.source: Fusion 8 from VMWare will let you run Visual Studio right on your Mac desktop.
segment.target: Fusion 8 from VMWare will let you run Visual Studio right on your Mac desktop.

segment.source: A pro version is available to offer developers some more advanced features such as vSphere support.
segment.target: A pro version is available to offer developers some more advanced features such as vSphere support.

segment.source: For more info, and a free trial version, see VMware Fusion.
segment.target: For more info, and a free trial version, see VMware Fusion.

segment.source: Oracle VirtualBox
segment.target: Oracle VirtualBox

segment.source: VirtualBox is a free application for running virtual machines on your computer, and it supports running Windows on Mac.
segment.target: VirtualBox is a free application for running virtual machines on your computer, and it supports running Windows on Mac.

segment.source: It is a no-frills option, but the price is appealing.
segment.target: It is a no-frills option, but the price is appealing.

segment.source: For more info, see VirtualBox.
segment.target: For more info, see VirtualBox.
